publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4213 Shiona Baird: DC Thomson Takeover of Aberdeen Journals—That the Parliament notes the takeover by DC Thomson of Aberdeen Journals, publisher of the Press & Journal and the Evening Express; welcomes this development as securing Scottish ownership of Scottish-based newspapers; congratulates DC Thomson on avoiding any major staffing cuts, despite recent drastic cuts in staffing levels at other national and regional newspapers; urges DC Thomson to take all measures possible to secure current levels of employment, and wishes the company and its staff a very prosperous future.

S2M-4213 Shiona Baird: DC Thomson Takeover of Aberdeen Journals—That the Parliament notes the takeover by DC Thomson of Aberdeen Journals, publisher of the Press & Journal and the Evening Express; welcomes this development as securing Scottish ownership of Scottish-based newspapers; congratulates DC Thomson on avoiding any major staffing cuts, despite recent drastic cuts in staffing levels at other national and regional newspapers; urges DC Thomson to take all measures possible to secure current levels of employment, and wishes the company and its staff a very prosperous future. Supported by: Donald Gorrie

S2M-4213 DC Thomson Takeover of Aberdeen Journals (lodged on 29 March 2006) Chris Ballance*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*, Mr John Swinney*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4213 DC Thomson Takeover of Aberdeen Journals (lodged on 29 March 2006) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-4213 DC Thomson Takeover of Aberdeen Journals (lodged on 29 March 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*
